red_phase.description: Run baseline scenarios WITHOUT skill, watch agents fail
red_phase.verification: Document exact failures and rationalizations verbatim

green_phase.description: Write minimal skill addressing specific baseline failures
green_phase.verification: Run same scenarios WITH skill, verify compliance
forbidden: Adding extra content for hypothetical cases
Writing generic counters instead of specific ones

refactor_phase.description: Close loopholes and add counters for new rationalizations
required_elements: Add explicit negations for each loophole

pressure_scenario_types: Sunk cost (hours of work, 'waste' to delete)
Authority (senior says skip it, manager overrides)
Exhaustion (end of day, tired, want to go home)
